data.text:
When I found Mr. C.B. in town, she was ill. She insisted it wasn't 
serious, so I decided to take her to her house for now.
data.processed:
<story>When I found Mr. C.B. in town, she was ill. She insisted it wasn't 
<story>serious, so I decided to take her to her house for now.

data.text:
Haha, sorry for making you take me home. 
Ahh... I'm glad you did...
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: Should I take you to the hospital?

data.processed:
<story>Haha, sorry for making you take me home. 
<story>Ahh... I'm glad you did...

data.text:
No, I'm fine. 
This kind of thing usually heals with some rest... cough.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>No, I'm fine. 
<story>This kind of thing usually heals with some rest... cough.

data.text:
...I was a bit worried, but it probably wouldn't 
be good to stay too long. As I was about to leave――
data.processed:
<story>...I was a bit worried, but it probably wouldn't 
<story>be good to stay too long. As I was about to leave――

data.text: Wait.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Wait.

data.text:
I live alone. There's nothing in the house right now... 
Sorry, but could you buy some water for me...?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I live alone. There's nothing in the house right now... 
<story>Sorry, but could you buy some water for me...?

data.text:
Upon closer inspection, there was not only no water but not a 
single piece of food, so I bought a few things and cooked them... 
Before I knew it, I was taking care of her.
data.processed:
<story>Upon closer inspection, there was not only no water but not a 
<story>single piece of food, so I bought a few things and cooked them... 
<story>Before I knew it, I was taking care of her.

data.text:
Ahh~..., the noodles are so delicious...! 
...Thanks for the meal... I'm really grateful.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Ahh~..., the noodles are so delicious...! 
<story>...Thanks for the meal... I'm really grateful.

data.text:
I prepared ready-made meals, regular medicines and nutritional 
drinks on the table. With this much, she shouldn't have any 
inconvenience even if she stays in bed for a few days.
data.processed:
<story>I prepared ready-made meals, regular medicines and nutritional 
<story>drinks on the table. With this much, she shouldn't have any 
<story>inconvenience even if she stays in bed for a few days.

data.text: ...And I felt a look from Mr. C.B..
data.processed: <story>...And I felt a look from Mr. C.B..

data.text:
I'm sorry. 
I turned so many scouts.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm sorry. 
<story>I turned so many scouts.

data.text:
I'm sure you're an excellent and kind trainer. I can tell by 
looking at you. It's not your fault. It's just...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I'm sure you're an excellent and kind trainer. I can tell by 
<story>looking at you. It's not your fault. It's just...

data.text: ...A long time ago.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...A long time ago.

data.text:
――I used to belong to a famous club team in the past. 
There, I received training from various famous trainers.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>――I used to belong to a famous club team in the past. 
<story>There, I received training from various famous trainers.

data.text:
"Your power is only effective if you can escape." 
"Let's learn to run in all sorts of way so we can deal with anything."
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>"Your power is only effective if you can escape." 
<story>"Let's learn to run in all sorts of way so we can deal with anything."

data.text:
"Then you can win a G1, win the URA Award, 
and even become a Triple Crown Umamusume." 
I got a lot of words like that. But――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>"Then you can win a G1, win the URA Award, 
<story>and even become a Triple Crown Umamusume." 
<story>I got a lot of words like that. But――

data.text:
I couldn't be interested in winning a G1 
or becoming a Triple Crown Umamusume.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't be interested in winning a G1 
<story>or becoming a Triple Crown Umamusume.

data.text:
I know what "Trainers" want more than anything. 
A big track record, a unique source of pride.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I know what "Trainers" want more than anything. 
<story>A big track record, a unique source of pride.

data.text:
But, no matter what. What kind of honor do I get if I win a race? 
How many times do I have to win to be amazing?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But, no matter what. What kind of honor do I get if I win a race? 
<story>How many times do I have to win to be amazing?

data.text:
I couldn't genuienly be interested in that. 
So――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I couldn't genuienly be interested in that. 
<story>So――

data.text: Why can't you listen to what I say?
data.name: Trainer
data.processed: <story>Why can't you listen to what I say?

data.text:
...I had a disagreement with my trainers. 
I decided to quit.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...I had a disagreement with my trainers. 
<story>I decided to quit.

data.text:
...I still don't really understand it. 
I also want to run for the sake of the future 
of Umamusume like Rudolf.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...I still don't really understand it. 
<story>I also want to run for the sake of the future 
<story>of Umamusume like Rudolf.

data.text:
I understand that it's wonderful to want to see someone's smile, 
wanting to make something exciting...
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>I understand that it's wonderful to want to see someone's smile, 
<story>wanting to make something exciting...

data.text:
But for me, that place is not like that. 
It's just something for running, nothing more.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But for me, that place is not like that. 
<story>It's just something for running, nothing more.

data.text: ...That's the greatest happiness.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...That's the greatest happiness.

data.text:
She lives to run. Her fundamental values 
are greatly out of sync with society.
data.processed:
<story>She lives to run. Her fundamental values 
<story>are greatly out of sync with society.

data.text:
...However, it's not necessary to have the same dream in the 
first place. For starters, many Umamusume form contracts with 
trainers for the sake of their debut.
data.processed:
<story>...However, it's not necessary to have the same dream in the 
<story>first place. For starters, many Umamusume form contracts with 
<story>trainers for the sake of their debut.

data.text:
It seems like a problem that should be easily resolved 
if we both make compromises, but――
data.processed:
<story>It seems like a problem that should be easily resolved 
<story>if we both make compromises, but――

data.text:
If she can't accept that, she can't move forward. 
She can't lie no matter what. Despite her free-spirited atmosphere, 
she seemed to be quite clumsy in character.
data.processed:
<story>If she can't accept that, she can't move forward. 
<story>She can't lie no matter what. Despite her free-spirited atmosphere, 
<story>she seemed to be quite clumsy in character.

data.text:
As I thought back on Mr. C.B.'s story... 
I suddenly realized something.
data.processed:
<story>As I thought back on Mr. C.B.'s story... 
<story>I suddenly realized something.

data.text:
She can't aim for the "G1 victory" or "Triple Crown Umamusume" 
that the trainer desires. If the trainer can adapt to her values, 
then――
data.processed:
<story>She can't aim for the "G1 victory" or "Triple Crown Umamusume" 
<story>that the trainer desires. If the trainer can adapt to her values, 
<story>then――

data.text:
Wouldn't it be better if I could love racing 
as much as she does?
data.processed:
<story>Wouldn't it be better if I could love racing 
<story>as much as she does?

data.text: You want to know what I see during a race?
data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: I want to know what kind of charm you feel.
choices.processed: <size=38>I want to know what kind of charm you feel.</size>

data.processed: <story>You want to know what I see during a race?

data.text: Huh, why?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Huh, why?

data.text: I tried to summarize and explain why――
data.processed: <story>I tried to summarize and explain why――

data.text:
.... 
You want to get closer to me? You?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>.... 
<story>You want to get closer to me? You?

data.text: ...Hmm, no. I was just a little surprised.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...Hmm, no. I was just a little surprised.

data.text:
But... it's nice. Yeah, not bad. Not bad at all. 
Let's give it a try!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But... it's nice. Yeah, not bad. Not bad at all. 
<story>Let's give it a try!

data.text: Then... well, close your eyes.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Then... well, close your eyes.

data.text:
Imagine you are inside a narrow gate, 
beyond it, the turf is lush and green.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Imagine you are inside a narrow gate, 
<story>beyond it, the turf is lush and green.

data.text:
Lined up next to you, nearly 10 selected Umamusume in total. 
Rudolf and Ace... they're all kids who look like they'll 
give an interesting race.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Lined up next to you, nearly 10 selected Umamusume in total. 
<story>Rudolf and Ace... they're all kids who look like they'll 
<story>give an interesting race.

data.text:
The fanfare resounds and the gate opens. 
From that narrow, dark place, you leap onto the green turf!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>The fanfare resounds and the gate opens. 
<story>From that narrow, dark place, you leap onto the green turf!

data.text:
The grass is soft today. The cold air passes through your body. 
The kids next to you are positioning themselves 
one after another, moving forward.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>The grass is soft today. The cold air passes through your body. 
<story>The kids next to you are positioning themselves 
<story>one after another, moving forward.

data.text:
You're not in the mood for that. 
That's right... go to the back and watch the race from there.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>You're not in the mood for that. 
<story>That's right... go to the back and watch the race from there.

data.text:
...The third corner and the hill are coming! 
Speed up as fast as your bouncing heart can, climb up and down―― 
the final corner!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>...The third corner and the hill are coming! 
<story>Speed up as fast as your bouncing heart can, climb up and down―― 
<story>the final corner!

data.text:
The others around you accelerate all at once, don't miss the heat, 
catch the lead! Push your legs in with all your might once more, 
short breaths, inhale and exhale――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>The others around you accelerate all at once, don't miss the heat, 
<story>catch the lead! Push your legs in with all your might once more, 
<story>short breaths, inhale and exhale――

data.text: Run!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>Run!

data.text:
Faster than the wind, faster than the light, throw away 
everything and move forward! No one can stop you, 
no one can tie you down...!
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Faster than the wind, faster than the light, throw away 
<story>everything and move forward! No one can stop you, 
<story>no one can tie you down...!

data.text:
――When I opened my eyes, 
she was peering at me with an excited look.
data.processed:
<story>――When I opened my eyes, 
<story>she was peering at me with an excited look.

data.text:
Hehe, now I feel like going for a run. 
So... how was it? How did it go?
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>Hehe, now I feel like going for a run. 
<story>So... how was it? How did it go?

data.text:
I could understand what kind of thing it was. 
Just imagining it, it felt like my heart was fluttering a little. 
But――
data.processed:
<story>I could understand what kind of thing it was. 
<story>Just imagining it, it felt like my heart was fluttering a little. 
<story>But――

data.name: Mr. C.B.

choices.text: (I feel like I've lost to the heat of the explanation...)
choices.processed: <size=32>(I feel like I've lost to the heat of the explanation...)</size>

data.processed: <story>...? Hm?

data.text:
The way she spoke was kind, passionate, 
and overflowing with love. It was probably 
far from what I felt.
data.processed:
<story>The way she spoke was kind, passionate, 
<story>and overflowing with love. It was probably 
<story>far from what I felt.

data.text:
I thought that if I could love racing as much as her, but... 
It might have been an overly presumptuous suggestion.

choices.text: Maybe I didn't really understood it.

data.processed:
<story>I thought that if I could love racing as much as her, but... 
<story>It might have been an overly presumptuous suggestion.

data.text: ...Ahaha, I see, so that's how it is. ...I knew it.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>...Ahaha, I see, so that's how it is. ...I knew it.

data.text:
But if you'd told me you understood, 
you might have made a contract! 
You, how should I say it――
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed:
<story>But if you'd told me you understood, 
<story>you might have made a contract! 
<story>You, how should I say it――

data.text: You're so honest. ...Hehe.
data.name: Mr. C.B.
data.processed: <story>You're so honest. ...Hehe.

title: When I close my eyes I see everything
